snippet: The New York Civil Liberties Union, calling solitary confinement psychological torture, said it was imposed for trivial offenses and in a racially biased manner.
abstract: New York Civil Liberties Union files suit against New York State, calling solitary confinement in prison psychological torture and that the widespread punishment is often imposed for trivial offenses and in a racially biased manner.
lead_paragraph: The New York Civil Liberties Union, calling solitary confinement psychological torture, said it was imposed for trivial offenses and in a racially biased manner.
